total_revenue.label: Total Success Revenue
total_revenue.source_query: SELECT SUM(amount) FROM payment_transaction WHERE status = 'SUCCESS'

occupancy_rate.label: Average Fleet Occupancy
occupancy_rate.source_query: SELECT ROUND((COUNT(booking_id) / SUM(capacity)) * 100, 2) FROM cruise_trip JOIN cruise_ship...

pending_receivables.label: Pending Payments
pending_receivables.source_query: SELECT SUM(total_price - paid) FROM cabin_booking WHERE status = 'CONFIRMED'

active_passengers.label: Current Onboard Guests
active_passengers.source_query: SELECT COUNT(user_id) FROM user_role WHERE role_id = (SELECT role_id FROM app_role WHERE role_name = 'PASSENGER')

revenue_by_cabin.source_query: SELECT ct.display_name, SUM(pt.amount) FROM cabin_type ct JOIN ... GROUP BY ct.cabin_type_id

service_demand.source_query: SELECT service_type, COUNT(*) FROM activity_schedule GROUP BY service_type

booking_trends.source_query: SELECT MONTHNAME(created_at), COUNT(*) FROM cabin_booking GROUP BY MONTH(created_at)
